Text: Grahamstown Dam:  The dam is located north of Newcastle and within the Port Stephens Council local government area in the Lower Hunter Region of New South Wales, Australia.
Triplets:<Grahamstown Dam
2:
--------------------
<Text: Grahamstown Dam:  The dam's main purpose is water supply; it provides about 40 per cent of the potable water for the Hunter region; and is the Hunter's largest drinking water supply dam.>
